Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.goobi.production.flow.jobs.HotfolderJob
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask
    New task implementations should directly implement EmptyTask.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.cancel()
    Replaced by Thread.interrupt().
    de.sub.goobi.helper.PaginatingCriteria.createAlias(String, String, int)
    de.sub.goobi.helper.PaginatingCriteria.createAlias(String, String, int, Criterion)
    de.sub.goobi.helper.PaginatingCriteria.createCriteria(String, int)
    de.sub.goobi.helper.PaginatingCriteria.createCriteria(String, String, int)
    de.sub.goobi.helper.PaginatingCriteria.createCriteria(String, String, int, Criterion)
    de.sub.goobi.forms.AktuelleSchritteForm.executeModule()
    de.sub.goobi.forms.AktuelleSchritteForm.getHomeBaende()
    org.goobi.production.enums.PluginType.getInterfaz()
    Using this function is discouraged. Use UnspecificPlugin.typeOf(Class) instead.
    org.goobi.production.plugin.PluginLoader.getPlugin(PluginType, String)
    org.goobi.production.plugin.PluginLoader.getPluginByTitle(PluginType, String)
    Using this function is discouraged. Use getPluginByTitle(Class, String, Locale) instead.
    org.goobi.production.plugin.PluginLoader.getPluginList(PluginType)
    Using this function is discouraged. Use getPlugins(Class) instead.
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.getStatusMessage()
    Replaced by EmptyTask.getTaskState().
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.getStatusProgress()
    Replaced by EmptyTask.getProgress().
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.getTitle()
    Replaced by Thread.getName().
    de.sub.goobi.forms.AktuelleSchritteForm.saveProperties()
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.setLongMessage(String)
    Replaced by EmptyTask.setWorkDetail(String).
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.setStatusMessage(String)
    Replaced by EmptyTask.setWorkDetail(String).
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.setStatusProgress(double)
    Replaced by EmptyTask.setProgress(double).
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.setStatusProgress(int)
    Replaced by EmptyTask.setProgress(int).
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.setTitle(String)
    Replaced by EmptyTask.EmptyTask(String).
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask.stopped()
    The method stopped() has become redundant due to newer development. The thread state is now directly derived from Thread.getState() which is reliable in determining whether the thread has died, independent of whether it ever managed to call stopped() or died before.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks.LongRunningTask()
    New task implementations should directly implement EmptyTask.
